channel.title: www.Pandora.com - Sweet Radio Station
channel.description:
www.Pandora.com - Sweet Radio Station
Ever heard of it? You can search for songs by artist and name. Some of the time it won't allow you to get the exact artist, but it will play songs from similar artists which gets you into other music. I searched for Jimi Hendrix and got a few of his songs and some other songs similar to him which were pretty good too.
Just something nice to listen to. :) Enjoy.

item.title: www.Pandora.com - Sweet Radio Station
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

Dear Pandora Visitor,

We are deeply, deeply sorry to say that due to licensing constraints, we can no longer allow access to Pandora for most listeners located outside of the U.S. We will continue to work diligently to realize the vision of a truly global Pandora, but for the time being we are required to restrict its use. We are very sad to have to do this, but there is no other alternative.

We believe that you are in Finland (your IP address appears to be xx.xx.xxx.xxx). If you believe we have made a mistake, we apologize and ask that you please contact us at pandora-support@pandora.com

If you are a paid subscriber, please contact us at pandora-support@pandora.com and we will issue a pro-rated refund to the credit card you used to sign up. If you have been using Pandora, we will keep a record of your existing stations and bookmarked artists and songs, so that when we are able to launch in your country, they will be waiting for you.

We will be notifying listeners as licensing agreements are established in individual countries. If you would like to be notified by email when Pandora is available in your country, please enter your email address below. The pace of global licensing is hard to predict, but we have the ultimate goal of being able to offer our service everywhere.

We share your disappointment and greatly appreciate your understanding.

Sincerely,

Tim Westergren
Founder

I used to listen to that “station” a lot before it closed down for the rest of the world. Nowadays I listen to last.fm, which is similar to Pandora.

Read full topic

item.title: www.Pandora.com - Sweet Radio Station
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Hey ron i never see you post anymore dude, but yeah its probably just my idiotic fault :P.

Will listen to it later, the radio station i usually listen to is at www.thex953.com which is some arkansas (or however you spell it) radio station from america, im in the UK and had my friend (vbcoderx) tell me about it.
They play really great songs there lol.
Anyways cya.
